name: ecexg
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl5eqel(cec(c2, c0), universe, cima(c0, csn(c2)), wcel(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cec(c2, c0), universe))
-| wceq(cec(c2, c0), cima(c0, csn(c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cima(c0, csn(c2)), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cec(c2, c0), universe))
-| wceq(cec(c2, c0), cima(c0, csn(c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cima(c0, csn(c2)), universe))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cec(c2, c0), universe))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cima(c0, csn(c2)), universe))

comment: An equivalence class modulo a set is a set. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jul-1995.)
